alert.note: Alert for Clarke (Mississippi) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Warning issued April 18 at 8:54PM CDT until April 21 at 5:54AM CDT by NWS Jackson
info.description: ...The Flood Warning is extended for the following rivers in Mississippi... Chickasawhay River At Enterprise affecting Clarke County. ...FLOOD WARNING NOW IN EFFECT UNTIL LATE WEDNESDAY NIGHT... * WHAT...Minor flooding is occurring and minor flooding is forecast. * WHERE...Chickasawhay River At Enterprise. * WHEN...Until late Wednesday night. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 8:00 PM CDT Monday the stage was 27.2 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to rise to a crest of 27.5 feet tomorrow morning. - Flood stage is 25.0 feet. && Fld Observed Forecasts (7 pm CDT) Location Stg Stg Day/Time Tue Wed Thu Chickasawhay River Enterprise 25.0 27.2 Mon 8 pm CDT 27.1 23.4 19.1 &&
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles. Forecast includes rainfall on the ground and 24 hours of additional rainfall. Additional information is available at www.water.weather.gov/ahps2/index.php?wfo=JAN The next statement will be issued Tuesday morning at 1100 AM CDT.
